This Website

After several days working together, we manage to get a very basic website up and running.

These days having a website shows many relevant skills: writing, IT awareness, design and coding. And more importantly, it's an efficient way to communicate with the world.

The website was done from scratch. It's hosted on a EC2 instance in Amazon Cloud. It runs a Node/Express server, that renders part of the pages on the fly, using ejs. The style on the other hand is written in Sass.

The source code for this site can be found on Github.

Other Projects

Linda is learning to produce music using Ableton, and brushing up statistics in SPSS. Santi is tinkering with raspberry pis.
